languages.text: "Извещаю: все акты кощунственного воровства, попрания привилегий Адептус Механикус и мародерства будут каталогизированы для исполнения правосудия".
"Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."
languages.original_text: "Извещаю: все акты кощунственного воровства, попрания привилегий Адептус Механикус и мародерства будут каталогизированы для исполнения правосудия".

traits.locale_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “请注意：所有亵渎性盗窃行为、侵犯机械修会特权的行为，以及抢劫行为，都将被列为司法执行的目标。”
languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

traits.locale_text: “请注意：所有亵渎性盗窃行为、侵犯机械修会特权的行为，以及抢劫行为，都将被列为司法执行的目标。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Sachez que tout acte de vol sacrilège, tout empiétement sur les privilèges de l'Adeptus Mechanicus et tout pillage sera catalogué à des fins judiciaires. »
languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

traits.locale_text: « Sachez que tout acte de vol sacrilège, tout empiétement sur les privilèges de l'Adeptus Mechanicus et tout pillage sera catalogué à des fins judiciaires. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Advertencia: todos los hurtos sacrílegos, las infracciones de privilegios del Adeptus Mechanicus y los saqueos serán catalogados para el cumplimiento de la justicia».
languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

traits.locale_text: «Advertencia: todos los hurtos sacrílegos, las infracciones de privilegios del Adeptus Mechanicus y los saqueos serán catalogados para el cumplimiento de la justicia».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「忠告する：神聖を汚す盗みは万事、帝国技術局の特権を侵すものである。略奪品は正義を執行する目的で目録に記載される」
languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

traits.locale_text: 「忠告する：神聖を汚す盗みは万事、帝国技術局の特権を侵すものである。略奪品は正義を執行する目的で目録に記載される」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Hinweis: Alle Handlungen des frevlerischen Diebstahls, der ungerechtfertigten Inanspruchnahme der Privilegien des Adeptus Mechanicus und des Plünderns werden für Zwecke der Strafverfolgung protokolliert."
languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

languages.original_text: "Be advised: all acts of sacrilegious theft, encroachment on Adeptus Mechanicus privileges, and looting will be catalogued for justice enforcement purposes."

languages.text: "Dikkat: Tüm kutsal hırsızlığı, Adeptus Mechanicus ayrıcalıklarına tecavüz ve yağma eylemleri; adaletin sağlanabilmesi için kataloglanacaktır."
